publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1947 Helen Eadie: Safety of Forth Bridge—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to secure an urgent inspection by Her Majesty’s Rail Inspectorate of track and rail infrastructure for the Forth Bridge and all track and rail lines in the immediate vicinity and thereafter to provide a comprehensive report on the safety of all lines and infrastructure across Scotland as a matter of urgency.

S2M-1947 Safety of Forth Bridge (lodged on 3 November 2004) Tricia Marwick*, Rosie Kane*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Shiona Baird*, Rob Gibson*, Bruce Crawford*, Colin Fox*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*

S2M-1947 Helen Eadie: Safety of Forth Bridge—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to secure an urgent inspection by Her Majesty’s Rail Inspectorate of track and rail infrastructure for the Forth Bridge and all track and rail lines in the immediate vicinity and thereafter to provide a comprehensive report on the safety of all lines and infrastructure across Scotland as a matter of urgency. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Rosie Kane, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Shiona Baird, Rob Gibson, Bruce Crawford, Colin Fox, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-1947 Safety of Forth Bridge (lodged on 3 November 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1947 Safety of Forth Bridge (lodged on 3 November 2004) Margaret Smith*
